00034 function echo_error      ($p_log) {
00035         $fdebug=fopen("/tmp/phpcompta_error.log","a+");
00036         fwrite($fdebug,date("Ymd H:i:s").$p_log."\n");
00037         fclose($fdebug);
00038         echo_debug($p_log);
00039 }

00051 function cmpDate ($p_date,$p_date_oth) {
00052   $l_date=isDate($p_date);
00053   $l2_date=isDate($p_date_oth);
00054   if ($l_date == null || $l2_date == null ) {
00055     echo "erreur date";
00056     return null;
00057   }
00058   $l_adate=explode(".",$l_date);
00059   $l2_adate=explode(".",$l2_date);
00060   $l_mkdate=mktime(0,0,0,$l_adate[1],$l_adate[0],$l_adate[2]);
00061   $l2_mkdate=mktime(0,0,0,$l2_adate[1],$l2_adate[0],$l2_adate[2]);
00062   // si $p_date > $p_date_oth return > 0
00063   return $l_mkdate-$l2_mkdate;
00064 }
00065 /* \function IsNumber
00066  * \brief check if the argument is a number
00067  *
00068  * \parm : $p_int
00069  *
00070  * \return 1 it's a number
00071  *        0 it is not
00072  */
00073 function isNumber($p_int) {
00074   if ( strlen (trim($p_int)) == 0 ) return 0;
00075   $p_int=trim($p_int);
00076   if (! ereg ("^-{0,1}[0-9]+.{0,1}[0-9]*$",$p_int) ) {
00077     return 0;
00078   } else {
00079     return 1;
00080   }// !ereg
00081 }
00082 
00096 function isDate ( $p_date) {
00097   if ( strlen (trim($p_date)) == 0 ) return null;
00098   if (! ereg ("^[0-9]{1,2}\.[0-9]{1,2}\.20[0-9]{2}",$p_date) ) {
00099 
00100     return null;
00101   } else {
00102     $l_date=explode(".",$p_date);
00103     if ( $l_date[2] > 2020 ) {
00104       return null;
00105     }
00106     if ( checkdate ($l_date[1],$l_date[0],$l_date[2]) == false) {
00107       return null;
00108     }
00109 
00110   }// !ereg
00111   return $p_date;
00112 }
00118 function formatDate($p_date) {
00119   if ( isDate($p_date)== null) return "null";
00120   return "'".$p_date."'";
00121 }
00134 function html_page_start($p_theme="",$p_script="",$p_script2="")
00135 {       
00136   include_once ("postgres.php");
00137  ini_set('magic_quotes_gpc','Off');
00138 
00139  $cn=DbConnect();
00140  if ( $p_theme != "") {
00141    $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select the_filestyle from theme
00142                    where the_name='".$p_theme."'");
00143     if (pg_NumRows($Res)==0) 
00144       $style="style.css";
00145     else {
00146       $s=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00147       $style=$s['the_filestyle'];
00148     }
00149  }else {
00150    $style="style.css";
00151  } // end if
00152  echo '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2 FINAL//EN">';
00153  echo "<HTML>";
00154 
00155  if ( $p_script2 != "" )
00156    $p_script2='<script src="'.$p_script2.'" type="text/javascript"></script>';
00157 
00158  echo "<HEAD> 
00159       <TITLE>PhpCompta</TITLE>
00160       <META http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1\">
00161       <LINK REL=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" href=\"$style\" media=\"screen\">
00162       <link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" href=\"style-print.css\" media=\"print\">".
00163    $p_script2. "
00164         </HEAD><script src=\"scripts.js\" type=\"text/javascript\"></script>";
00165  echo "<BODY $p_script>";
00166 }

00218 function FormatString($p_string) 
00219 {
00220   if ( !isset ($p_string) ) {
00221     echo_error("ac_common.php FormatString p_string empty");
00222     return null;
00223   }
00224   $p_string=trim($p_string);
00225   if (strlen($p_string) == 0 ) return null;
00226   $p_string=str_replace("\'","'",$p_string);
00227   $p_string=str_replace("''","'",$p_string);
00228   $p_string=str_replace("'","\'",$p_string);
00229   return $p_string;
00230 }

00233 /* \brief store the string which print */
00234 /*           the content of p_array in a table */
00235 /*           used to display the menu */
00236 /* parameter : array */
00237 /* \return : string */
00238 function ShowItem($p_array,$p_dir='V',$class="mtitle",$class_ref="mtitle",$default="",$p_extra="")
00239 {
00240   $ret="<TABLE $p_extra>";
00241   // direction Vertical
00242   if ( $p_dir == 'V') {
00243     foreach ($p_array as $all=>$href){
00244       $title="";
00245       if ( isset ($href[2] )) 
00246         $title=$href[2];
00247       $ret.='<TR><TD CLASS="'.$class.'"><A class="'.$class_ref.'" HREF="'.$href[0].'" title="'.$title.'">'.$href[1].'</A></TD></TR>';
00248     }
00249   }
00250       //direction Horizontal
00251   else if ( $p_dir == 'H' ) {
00252     $ret.="<TR>";
00253     foreach ($p_array as $all=>$href){
00254       $title="";
00255       if ( isset ($href[2] )) 
00256         $title=$href[2];
00257       if ( $default== $href[0]) {
00258       $ret.='<TD CLASS="selectedcell">'.$href[1].'</TD>';
00259 
00260       } else {
00261       $ret.='<TD CLASS="'.$class.'"><A class="'.$class_ref.'" HREF="'.$href[0].'" title="'.$title.'">'.$href[1].'</A></TD>';
00262       }
00263     }
00264     $ret.="</TR>";
00265   }
00266     $ret.="</TABLE>";
00267   return $ret;
00268 }

00293 function make_array($p_cn,$p_sql,$p_null=0) {
00294 
00295   $a=pg_exec($p_cn,$p_sql);
00296   $max=pg_NumRows($a);
00297   if ( $max==0) return null;
00298   for ($i=0;$i<$max;$i++) {
00299     $row=pg_fetch_row($a);
00300     $r[$i]['value']=$row[0];
00301     $r[$i]['label']=$row[1];
00302   }
00303   // add a blank item ?
00304   if ( $p_null == 1 ) {
00305   for ($i=$max;$i!=0;$i--) {
00306     $r[$i]['value']=    $r[$i-1]['value'];
00307     $r[$i]['label']=    $r[$i-1]['label'];
00308   }
00309   $r[0]['value']=-1;
00310   $r[0]['label']=" ";
00311   } //   if ( $p_null == 1 ) 
00312 
00313   return $r;
00314 }
00327 function getPeriodeName($p_cn,$p_id,$pos='p_start') {
00328   if ( $pos != 'p_start' and 
00329        $pos != 'p_end')
00330     echo_error('ac_common.php'."-".__LINE__.'  UNDEFINED PERIODE');
00331   $ret=execSql($p_cn,"select to_char($pos,'Mon YYYY') as t from parm_periode where p_id=$p_id");
00332   if (pg_NumRows($ret) == 0) return null;
00333   $a=pg_fetch_array($ret,0);
00334   return $a['t'];
00335 }
00349 function getPeriodeFromMonth($p_cn,$p_date) {
00350   $R=ExecSql($p_cn,"select p_id from parm_periode where
00351               to_char(p_start,'DD.MM.YYYY') = '01.$p_date'");
00352   if ( pg_NumRows($R) == 0 ) 
00353     return -1;
00354   $a=pg_fetch_array($R,0);
00355 
00356   return $a['p_id'];
00357 }
00369 function getPeriodeFromDate($p_cn,$p_date) {
00370   $R=ExecSql($p_cn,"select p_id from parm_periode where
00371               p_start <= to_date('$p_date','DD.MM.YYYY')
00372            and p_end  >= to_date('$p_date','DD.MM.YYYY')
00373            ");
00374   if ( pg_NumRows($R) == 0 ) 
00375     return -1;
00376   $a=pg_fetch_array($R,0);
00377 
00378   return $a['p_id'];
00379 }
